main_definition: Pertaining to education, scholarship or study, especially as distinct from practical applications.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to higher education institutions and their activities
meanings_and_examples.example: She pursued an academic career at a prestigious university.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Concerning scholarship or learning rather than practical affairs
meanings_and_examples.example: The discussion was purely academic, focusing on theoretical concepts without real-world application.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of literature dealing with intellectual subjects and written in a formal style for scholars
meanings_and_examples.example: He is known for his extensive work on the subject of ancient Greek philosophy, including many academic texts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to or related to school curriculum or studies at an elementary level
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher assigned several academic books and materials for home reading.
